title: Episode 198: Toxic Time Traps with Eve Rodsky
itunes:title: Episode 198: Toxic Time Traps with Eve Rodsky
itunes:subtitle: Kate attempts to stop biting her nails and Doree struggles with a post-holiday break. Then, author and podcaster Eve Rodsky (Find Your Unicorn Space, Fair Play) comes on the podcast to talk about why she doesn’t like the word “hobby,” why she literally...
description:
Kate attempts to stop biting her nails and Doree struggles with a post-holiday break. Then, author and podcaster Eve Rodsky (Find Your Unicorn Space, Fair Play) comes on the podcast to talk about why she doesn’t like the word “hobby,” why she literally burned her guilt and shame, and why she writes and speaks to women. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
